name: ClickUp Tool
natural_language_description: 这是 ClickUp Tool 节点。主要用于: Consume ClickUp API (Beta)

descriptionType.name: descriptionType
descriptionType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Tool Description | 默认值: auto
available_options: Set Automatically (值: auto) - Automatically set based on resource and operation
Set Manually (值: manual) - Manually set the description

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.natural_language_description: 参数名: Description | 作用: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often | 默认值: Consume ClickUp API (Beta) | (必填项)

authentication.name: authentication
authentication.natural_language_description: 参数名: Authentication | 默认值: accessToken

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: task

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: customFields
available_options: Custom Fields (值: customFields) - Retrieve list's custom fields
Get Many (值: getAll) - Get many lists

task.name: task
task.natural_language_description: 参数名: Task ID | (必填项)

checklist.name: checklist
checklist.natural_language_description: 参数名: Checklist ID | (必填项)

updateFields.name: updateFields
updateFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Update Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: assignee (值: None) - Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression
priority (值: None) - Integer mapping as 1 : Urgent, 2 : High, 3 : Normal, 4 : Low

additionalFields.name: additionalFields
additionalFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Additional Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: priority (值: None) - Integer mapping as 1 : Urgent, 2 : High, 3 : Normal, 4 : Low
status (值: None) - Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

checklistItem.name: checklistItem
checklistItem.natural_language_description: 参数名: Checklist Item ID | (必填项)

id.name: id
id.natural_language_description: 参数名: List ID | 作用: Task ID | (必填项)

comment.name: comment
comment.natural_language_description: 参数名: Comment ID | (必填项)

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 50

team.name: team
team.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression
team.natural_language_description: 参数名: Team Name or ID | 作用: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression | (必填项)

space.name: space
space.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression
space.natural_language_description: 参数名: Space Name or ID | 作用: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression | (必填项)

folder.name: folder
folder.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression
folder.natural_language_description: 参数名: Folder Name or ID | 作用: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression | (必填项)

filters.name: filters
filters.natural_language_description: 参数名: Filters | 默认值: {}

goal.name: goal
goal.natural_language_description: 参数名: Goal ID | (必填项)

keyResult.name: keyResult
keyResult.natural_language_description: 参数名: Key Result ID | (必填项)

taskId.name: taskId
taskId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Task ID | (必填项)

tagName.name: tagName
tagName.natural_language_description: 参数名: Tag Name | (必填项)

listId.name: listId
listId.natural_language_description: 参数名: List ID | (必填项)

newName.name: newName
newName.description: New name to set for the tag
newName.natural_language_description: 参数名: New Name | 作用: New name to set for the tag | (必填项)

foregroundColor.name: foregroundColor
foregroundColor.natural_language_description: 参数名: Foreground Color | 默认值: #000000 | (必填项)

backgroundColor.name: backgroundColor
backgroundColor.natural_language_description: 参数名: Background Color | 默认值: #000000 | (必填项)

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: True

folderless.name: folderless
folderless.natural_language_description: 参数名: Folderless List | 默认值: False | (必填项)

list.name: list
list.natural_language_description: 参数名: List ID | (必填项)

includeSubtasks.name: includeSubtasks
includeSubtasks.description: Whether to also fetch and include subtasks for this task
includeSubtasks.natural_language_description: 参数名: Include Subtasks | 作用: Whether to also fetch and include subtasks for this task | 默认值: False

includeMarkdownDescription.name: includeMarkdownDescription
includeMarkdownDescription.description: Whether to include the markdown_description field in the response. This is important for preserving links in the description.
includeMarkdownDescription.natural_language_description: 参数名: Include Markdown Description | 作用: Whether to include the markdown_description field in the response. This is important for preserving links in the description. | 默认值: False

field.name: field
field.description: The ID of the field to add custom field to
field.natural_language_description: 参数名: Field ID | 作用: The ID of the field to add custom field to | (必填项)

jsonParse.name: jsonParse
jsonParse.description: The value is JSON and will be parsed as such. Is needed if for example needed for labels which expects the value to be an array.
jsonParse.natural_language_description: 参数名: Value Is JSON | 作用: The value is JSON and will be parsed as such. Is needed if for example needed for labels which expects the value to be an array. | 默认值: False

value.name: value
value.description: The value to set on custom field
value.natural_language_description: 参数名: Value | 作用: The value to set on custom field | (必填项)

dependsOnTask.name: dependsOnTask
dependsOnTask.natural_language_description: 参数名: Depends On Task ID | (必填项)

running.name: running
running.description: Whether to return just the current running time entry
running.natural_language_description: 参数名: Running | 作用: Whether to return just the current running time entry | 默认值: False

timeEntry.name: timeEntry
timeEntry.natural_language_description: 参数名: Time Entry ID | (必填项)

duration.name: duration
duration.natural_language_description: 参数名: Duration (Minutes) | 作用: Duration in minutes | 默认值: 0 | (必填项)

archived.name: archived
archived.natural_language_description: 参数名: Archived | 默认值: False | (必填项)

timeEntryIds.natural_language_description: 参数名: Time Entry IDs | (必填项)

tagsUi.natural_language_description: 参数名: Tags | 默认值: {}
